verses.verse: <S%H339>"Coastlands,<s%> listen to Me in <S%H2790>silence,<s%> And let the <S%H3816>peoples<s%> <S%H2498>gain<s%> <S%H2498>new<s%> <S%H3581>strength;<s%> Let them <S%H5066>come<s%> <S%H5066>forward,<s%> <S%H227>then<s%> let them <S%H1696>speak;<s%> Let us <S%H7126>come<s%> <S%H9191>together<s%> for <S%H4941>judgment.<s%>

<S%H4310>"Who<s%> has <S%H5782>aroused<s%> one from the <S%H4217>east<s%> Whom He <S%H7121>calls<s%> in <S%H6664>righteousness<s%> to His <S%H7272>feet<s%>? He <S%H5414>delivers<s%> up <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> him, And <S%H7287>subdues<s%> <S%H4428>kings.<s%> He <S%H5414>makes<s%> them like <S%H6083>dust<s%> with his <S%H2719>sword,<s%> As the wind-driven <S%H7179>chaff<s%> with his <S%H7198>bow.<s%>
"He <S%H7291>pursues<s%> them, <S%H5674>passing<s%> on in <S%H7965>safety,<s%> By a <S%H734>way<s%> he had not been <S%H935>traversing<s%> with his <S%H7272>feet.<s%>

<S%H4310>"Who<s%> has <S%H6466>performed<s%> and <S%H6213>accomplished<s%> [it,] <S%H7121>Calling<s%> forth the <S%H1755>generations<s%> from the <S%H7218>beginning<s%>? 'I, the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> am the <S%H7223>first,<s%> and with the <S%H314>last.<s%> I am He.'"

The <S%H339>coastlands<s%> have <S%H7200>seen<s%> and are <S%H3372>afraid;<s%> The <S%H7098>ends<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H2729>tremble;<s%> They have <S%H7126>drawn<s%> <S%H7126>near<s%> and have <S%H857>come.<s%>
<S%H376>Each<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> <S%H5826>helps<s%> his <S%H7453>neighbor,<s%> And <S%H559>says<s%> to his <S%H251>brother,<s%> "Be <S%H2388>strong!<s%>"

So the <S%H2796>craftsman<s%> <S%H2388>encourages<s%> the <S%H6884>smelter,<s%> [And] he who <S%H9140>smooths<s%> [metal] with the <S%H6360>hammer<s%> [encourages] him who <S%H1986>beats<s%> the <S%H6471>anvil,<s%> <S%H559>Saying<s%> of the <S%H1694>soldering,<s%> "It is <S%H2896>good<s%>"; And he <S%H2388>fastens<s%> it with <S%H4548>nails,<s%> [That] it should not <S%H4131>totter.<s%>
"But you, <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> My <S%H5650>servant,<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> I have <S%H977>chosen,<s%> <S%H2233>Descendant<s%> of <S%H85>Abraham<s%> My <S%H157>friend,<s%>

You <S%H834>whom<s%> I have <S%H2388>taken<s%> from the <S%H7098>ends<s%> of the <S%H776>earth,<s%> And <S%H7121>called<s%> from its <S%H678>remotest<s%> <S%H678>parts,<s%> And <S%H559>said<s%> to you, 'You are My <S%H5650>servant,<s%> I have <S%H977>chosen<s%> you and not <S%H3988>rejected<s%> you.

'Do not <S%H3372>fear,<s%> for I am with you; Do not anxiously <S%H8159>look<s%> about you, for I am your <S%H430>God.<s%> I will <S%H553>strengthen<s%> you, <S%H637>surely<s%> I will <S%H5826>help<s%> you, <S%H637>Surely<s%> I will <S%H8551>uphold<s%> you with My <S%H6664>righteous<s%> <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H3225>hand.<s%>'

<S%H2005>"Behold,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> those who are <S%H2734>angered<s%> at you will be <S%H954>shamed<s%> and <S%H3637>dishonored;<s%> <S%H376>Those<s%> <S%H376>who<s%> <S%H7379>contend<s%> with you will be as <S%H369>nothing,<s%> and will perish.

"You will <S%H1245>seek<s%> <S%H376>those<s%> <S%H376>who<s%> <S%H4695>quarrel<s%> with you, but will not <S%H4672>find<s%> them, <S%H376>Those<s%> <S%H376>who<s%> <S%H4421>war<s%> with you will be as <S%H369>nothing,<s%> and non-existent.

"For I am the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> who <S%H2388>upholds<s%> your <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H3225>hand,<s%> Who <S%H559>says<s%> to you, 'Do not <S%H3372>fear,<s%> I will <S%H5826>help<s%> you.'

"Do not <S%H3372>fear,<s%> you <S%H9641>worm<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> you <S%H4962>men<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> I will <S%H5826>help<s%> you," <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> "and your <S%H1350>Redeemer<s%> is the <S%H6918>Holy<s%> <S%H6918>One<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

<S%H2009>"Behold,<s%> I have <S%H7760>made<s%> you a <S%H2319>new,<s%> <S%H9167>sharp<s%> <S%H4173>threshing<s%> <S%H4173>sledge<s%> with double <S%H6310>edges;<s%> You will <S%H1758>thresh<s%> the <S%H2022>mountains,<s%> and <S%H1854>pulverize<s%> [them,] And will <S%H7760>make<s%> the <S%H1389>hills<s%> like <S%H4671>chaff.<s%>

"You will <S%H2219>winnow<s%> them, and the <S%H7307>wind<s%> will <S%H5375>carry<s%> them away, And the <S%H9370>storm<s%> will <S%H6327>scatter<s%> them; But you will <S%H1523>rejoice<s%> in the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> You will <S%H1984>glory<s%> in the <S%H6918>Holy<s%> <S%H6918>One<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

"The <S%H6041>afflicted<s%> and <S%H34>needy<s%> are <S%H1245>seeking<s%> <S%H4325>water,<s%> but <S%H369>there<s%> is <S%H369>none,<s%> And their <S%H3956>tongue<s%> is <S%H5405>parched<s%> with <S%H6772>thirst;<s%> I, the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> will <S%H6030>answer<s%> them Myself, [As] the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> I will not <S%H5800>forsake<s%> them.

"I will <S%H6605>open<s%> <S%H5104>rivers<s%> on the <S%H8205>bare<s%> <S%H8205>heights,<s%> And <S%H4599>springs<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H1237>valleys;<s%> I will <S%H7760>make<s%> the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> a <S%H98>pool<s%> of <S%H4325>water,<s%> And the <S%H6723>dry<s%> <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H4161>fountains<s%> of <S%H4325>water.<s%>

"I will <S%H5414>put<s%> the <S%H730>cedar<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> The <S%H7848>acacia,<s%> and the <S%H1918>myrtle,<s%> and the <S%H8081>olive<s%> <S%H8410>tree;<s%> I will <S%H7760>place<s%> the <S%H1265>juniper<s%> in the <S%H6160>desert,<s%> <S%H9191>Together<s%> with the <S%H8410>box<s%> <S%H8391>tree<s%> and the <S%H8391>cypress,<s%>

That they may <S%H7200>see<s%> and <S%H3045>recognize,<s%> And <S%H7760>consider<s%> and <S%H7919>gain<s%> <S%H7919>insight<s%> as <S%H9191>well,<s%> That the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H384>this,<s%> And the <S%H6918>Holy<s%> <S%H6918>One<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> has <S%H1254>created<s%> it.

<S%H7126>"Present<s%> your <S%H7379>case,<s%>" the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>says.<s%> <S%H5066>"Bring<s%> <S%H5066>forward<s%> your <S%H6110>strong<s%> [arguments,]" The <S%H4428>King<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H559>says.<s%>

Let them <S%H5066>bring<s%> <S%H5066>forth<s%> and <S%H5046>declare<s%> to us <S%H834>what<s%> is going to <S%H7136>take<s%> <S%H7136>place;<s%> As for the <S%H7223>former<s%> [events,] <S%H5046>declare<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> they [were,] That we may <S%H7760>consider<s%> them, and <S%H3045>know<s%> their <S%H319>outcome;<s%> <S%H176>Or<s%> <S%H8085>announce<s%> to us what is <S%H935>coming.<s%>

<S%H5046>Declare<s%> the <S%H857>things<s%> that are going to <S%H857>come<s%> <S%H268>afterward,<s%> That we may <S%H3045>know<s%> that you are <S%H430>gods;<s%> <S%H637>Indeed,<s%> <S%H3190>do<s%> <S%H3190>good<s%> or <S%H7489>evil,<s%> that we may anxiously <S%H8159>look<s%> about us and <S%H3372>fear<s%> <S%H9191>together.<s%>
<S%H2005>Behold,<s%> you are of <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H369>account,<s%> And your <S%H6467>work<s%> amounts to <S%H657>nothing;<s%> He who <S%H977>chooses<s%> you is an <S%H8441>abomination.<s%>

"I have <S%H5782>aroused<s%> one from the <S%H6828>north,<s%> and he has <S%H857>come;<s%> From the <S%H4217>rising<s%> of the <S%H8121>sun<s%> he will <S%H7121>call<s%> on My <S%H8034>name;<s%> And he will <S%H935>come<s%> upon <S%H5461>rulers<s%> as [upon] <S%H2563>mortar,<s%> Even as the <S%H3335>potter<s%> <S%H7429>treads<s%> <S%H2563>clay.<s%>"

<S%H4310>Who<s%> has <S%H5046>declared<s%> [this] from the <S%H7218>beginning,<s%> that we might <S%H3045>know<s%>? Or from <S%H6440>former<s%> <S%H6440>times,<s%> that we may <S%H559>say,<s%> "[He is] <S%H6662>right!<s%>"? <S%H637>Surely<s%> <S%H369>there<s%> was <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H369>one<s%> who <S%H5046>declared,<s%> <S%H637>Surely<s%> <S%H369>there<s%> was <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H369>one<s%> who <S%H8085>proclaimed,<s%> <S%H637>Surely<s%> <S%H369>there<s%> was <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H369>one<s%> who <S%H8085>heard<s%> your <S%H561>words.<s%>

<S%H7223>"Formerly<s%> [I said] to <S%H6726>Zion,<s%> <S%H2009>'Behold,<s%> <S%H2009>here<s%> they are.' And to <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> 'I will <S%H5414>give<s%> a <S%H1319>messenger<s%> of good <S%H1319>news.<s%>'
